#summary Broadcasts when the telopts state changes

=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * broadcasts when Aardwolf sends the telopts state change

= Help =
 {{{
/*
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]

Detects when there is a change in state

Example:

  function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text)
    if id == "3448fed8734053327438a4df" then
      state = GetPluginVariable ("3448fed8734053327438a4df", "state")
      statestring = GetPluginVariable ("3448fed8734053327438a4df", "statestring")
    end -- playing status changed
  end

To test if you are currently playing (after a reinstall):

  state = GetPluginVariable ("3448fed8734053327438a4df", "state")
  
You can also just do:
  state = GetPluginVariable ("3448fed8734053327438a4df")
  
and then get the values by:
  state.state
  state.statestring
*/
}}}

= Installation ==
 * download Nick's [http://www.gammon.com.au/mushclient/plugins/Aardwolf/telnet_options.lua telnet_options.lua] script into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf
 * download from stable [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/branches/stable/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf/State_Detector.xml here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf
